title: Poland PM condemns ‘repeated violation’ of airspace amid Russian attack on Ukraine – follow live
summary: Poland has closed its airports and initiated an operation to neutralize unidentified objects that crossed its border. This decision follows heightened security concerns. The situation appears to be a response to potential threats in the region.

title: Country diary: A wade through nettles that’s worth every sting | Nic Wilson
summary: In Purwell Ninesprings, Hertfordshire, small teasels have thrived in the local woods for 50 years. However, their population appears to be shifting unexpectedly. This movement raises questions about environmental changes affecting their habitat.

title: Rise in energy prices leaves 1m UK households behind on bills
summary: A recent report reveals that energy debts have more than doubled over the past 12 years. Meanwhile, Ofgem is indicating plans to raise the cap on energy bills. This combination could further strain households struggling with rising energy costs.

title: AKA Charlie Sheen review – he shows no genuine remorse for all the terrifying things he’s done
summary: The actor’s tell-all book recounts his long struggle with addiction to pills, alcohol, and crack cocaine but lacks significant self-reflection or genuine remorse. The narrative presents a shallow perspective on his experiences. Consequently, readers feel empathy for those affected by his actions.
